answer:
QUESTION
Assalamualaekum, Can grandson inherit the property of his grandfather if grandson?s father (son of the grandfather) has died. Jazak ALLAH u khaira
ANSWER


Share:
If there are no sons of the deceased alive and there are grandsons present,
then the grandson would inherit. (Jawaahirul Fiqh vol.2 pg.483)

If the deceased left behind son/s, then the grandson/s will not inherit.

and Allah Ta'ala Knows Best
